body:
Hi - I just recorded this today.  I was so proud to get all the kills myself for our team! 
Gameplay starts from mining to full diamond armor... Fun pvp/sniper encounters start at 5:50 wall drop (if you want to bypass the mining/chests of 30+ diamonds)
Thanks for watching and supporting my channel! :)
http://youtu.be/OT4uQi2mfwE

title: Tetris Jungle [Walls] gameplay video

replies.body: Great video, Murph! You're really good at Walls! ;D
replies.body_tagged: Great video, Murph! You're really good at Walls! ;D

replies.body: Nooice video. Love the guy who called you out for X-Ray XD.
replies.body_tagged: Nooice video. Love the guy who called you out for X-Ray XD.

replies.body: X-Ray is not allowed on the Avicus Network!
replies.body_tagged: X-Ray is not allowed on the Avicus Network!

replies.body:
Thanks for the feedback & support!  These videos make me laugh and players tell me in chat that my videos help their gameplay.

I hope you're all joking about the x-ray...I absolutely don't do that!!  Other players help me find diamonds and I have a good memory....that's all.

replies.body: Some guy in the sky base said you had X-ray when you killed him...
